tags: None
review: ** ** *** **** ***** ********** ** ****** My son Ebaad was born at Fortis GK 2 and he was the doctor present there along with Doctor Bhutani at the time of his birth and since last 5 years we visit him either at Fortis or at Triton whenever we need to consult a pediatrician. He gives decent time to understand the issue and is very humble and patient. Prescribe very less amount of strong medicines keeping children's imunity and side-effects etc in mind....we wish him all the best and thank him for all his help whenever we needed. Best regards. Farzaan

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have been consulting him for all pediatric medical needs for my son ( sincehe was 3 months old, now hes 2 years+)  and extremely happy with the way he has explained us all the ailments for which we have approached him and the need and effect of the given prescription of medicines. He is very prompt in responding to any calls/sms we have sent him in emergency for any ailment we faced in normal course of time.He is extremely patient with the children and is able to calm them when doing the check up as well as hearing us through when we are consulting him on general medical and health tips for our son.Best pat he is able to assure/comfort us as parents when we we are anxious about any prolonged medical ailment. I highly recommend him for all pediatric medical needs .

tags: None
review: *** ** *** **** ************ ** **** **** Calm, patient, child friendly and extremely helpful. Our twins were under his care from birth. He puts your mind to rest, avoids unnecessary medication, educates about every vaccination and will never force any vaccine. We have  moved from Delhi but he still is always readily available on the phone to help. Gives ample time and has never rushed through the visit. We are fortunate to have found him. We ensure to meet him whenever we visit Delhi.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Doctor is very nice to listen to the problems. He is very  cordial and also responds over phone in emergencies. He is very experienced and diagnoses very aptly.

tags: None
review: He is nice doctor for baby. He listen carefully all our concern. Provide right suggestion . Extremely satisfied with his way to treat a baby.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Awesome doctor. Listens n explains very well. Very satisfied. ***** ************* ******* Would definitely recommend. We are happy n satisfied with his guidance & medication.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Extremely patient and extremely sensitive to children., with superlative professionalism.When my girls fell badly ill in kerala and was hospitalized, he was there at every step counseling us, guiding us on line of treatment. he will take out time to explain calmly. Very reassuring and rare to find honest, hard working, committed medicos as him.
